website_summaries.verdict: A superior folding sideline bench for those who prioritize comfort and portability.
pros: Each seat is capable of supporting up to 200 pounds
Seats are equipped with backrests to ensure you can sit comfortably at all times
Double-layer fabric seats are designed to withstand rain, sleet and other harsh weather conditions
cons: Tends to come loose at the seams, even after minimal use

customer_reviews.title: so good. It's compact when not used and support when ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. It's compact when not used and support when used. I'm near 300 lbs and any seat I've been has been equally supportive and comfortable. This will be great for my family of six. :)
customer_reviews.author: audio_stan

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two, had to fix one right out of the box and the others carry bag is coming loose at the seems. I hope they last me at least a season. Spend the extra $$$ and buy quality. We will see how they hold up. Not impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Kids Loved It
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the soccer team and the kids loved it. Chair feels sturdy. It is a bit heavy, but that's to be expected for the sturdy quality. The only issue I had was that the chair would topple over on an extremely windy day, but that has more to do with the fact that the chair has backing then anything being defective. Overall, really enjoying the product.
customer_reviews.author: N. Lin

customer_reviews.title: A little cheap, but good.
customer_reviews.text: One thing you can't ignore is the smell. This thing has a VERY chemical and plasticy smell. We've had it for a few months and it's just now starting to get better. That aside, it a good little bench and should last a few seasons. The bag has handles, but no strap. A strap would be better for carrying over your shoulder, but the handle is big enough to work.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Holden

customer_reviews.title: Get it! Best product ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the business!!! I'm so happy I found this! I cant say enough good things! Easy to unfold and fold. Love the bag it comes in. Easy to carry. Color is pretty. My entire family of six can sit comfortably. I have a big rear and I can sit comfortably. We used it for 4th of July fireworks, games, and plan to bring it to the beach. I wish I would've found this product sooner! I get tons of compliments on it. So lightweight, my 7 year old can carry it in the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great for youth sporting events!
customer_reviews.text: This chair or chairs are perfect for my sons soccer team. They are better for youth and small adults. You would definitely be sitting shoulder to shoulder touching if you were a larger adult. That being said it is a sturdy chair and perfect for my kids. It is a little difficult getting it back in the bag for one person and more ideally a two person job. It’s a large HEAVY chair and if you were planning to carry it any substantial distance you might want to think of pulling it in a wagon. Over all it is nice chair. Not a “must have” but rather a nice item to have at certain events.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Low cost option
customer_reviews.text: Bench works great for the kids soccer team. Side bags are great. My only deduction is due to the carry bag. The handles don't allow for it to go over the shoulder, and the bench is heavy enough to be uncomfortable to carry in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: I have two sons playing soccer year-round and both teams were in need of a bench for the boys to use on the sidelines. This one fit the bill -- plenty of space for the subs to sit (both have large teams), very sturdy and high quality. My only complaint is that this thing is HEAVY. I get a workout lugging it to and from games. However, I suppose if it was lightweight it would be less sturdy, so I would prefer to build some muscle lugging it around versus having something that falls apart when used by a bunch of rowdy boys.
customer_reviews.author: New Mom 2006

customer_reviews.title: Pooe product and impossible to return
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 45.99 to use as a bench in youth soccer games. We were not satisfied with the product. Asked seller for a refund. They refused to provide a return shipping label. Cost by UPS to send back with our label was $90. They keep demanding long explanations, pictures and only wanted to provide parts or partial refunds. Stay away from this nightmare product and even more from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: A to Z Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works For Intended Purpose.
customer_reviews.text: This item is very sturdy, lightweight, easy to fold and unfold and fits easily in carrying case. Does have strong mothball scent upon opening package, but stretched it out and aired out before first use. After a couple uses the scent dissipated. Used for family seating at T-ball games. Does not hold 6 adults comfortably, more like 3/4 small adults/teenagers and a couple kids. For that reason 4 stars. But, priced very well and it will last several seasons - no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for kid's sports
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our U6/U8 soccer teams and they were a huge hit! Excellent build quality. Solid, sturdy bench. Easy enough to fold and unfold, which can be done with 1 person with patience. The bench is a little heavy, but I think that's a sign of good build quality so I'll gladly live with it.
customer_reviews.author: vulcz

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful but great size for the price
customer_reviews.text: Definitely had a horrid smell, but I scrubbed it with Castile soap and left it in the fresh air couple days in a row. It’s better. Still great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Bright B.

customer_reviews.title: Good chairs
customer_reviews.text: Overall not a bad product for the price. Arrived as described. The materials produce a strong odor, but if you leave the chairs out in the sun for 2-3 days it goes away. They can easily be carried by adult or two youth players. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: FC RASTA

customer_reviews.title: Every Tball team needs this!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t imagine coaching Tball without it. It’s went from a total zoo to somewhat organized. Hallelujer!! We’ve only had it for a few weeks so unless it starts breaking, I can’t speak to the sturdiness of it. But it’s fantastic so far.... And it isn’t gigantic in the trunk!
customer_reviews.author: Thumbshopper

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s suppose to do but a piece fell off after the 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my sons soccer team. A bit disappointed that one of the screws that holds the back to the corner post fell out after the second use. It still works but you have to keep putting the back on the post.
customer_reviews.author: Island Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Durable enough to handle soccer girls rough nest both with 4y.o, and 8 y.o...four stars only because it stunk when we got it...like it was just made...that plastic smell..we hosed it down and used laundry detergent to wash it with a rag..hosed it off and air dryed.. smell pretty much gone
customer_reviews.author: Misty Hocking

customer_reviews.title: Any Quality Worries Quickly Dispelled
customer_reviews.text: Portable, expandable outdoor seating is sturdy enough to seat 4 adults, and 2 kids. Built for 6 adults, we just haven't had to seat that many yet. Color is vibrant & quick to set up and take down. It is much better quality than I was expecting and we are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Domino

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my daughters soccer team U12. The girls loved it, and it survived fall session rain and all. I have used it for a lot more events than I originally bought it for things like kids movie night and tailgate! It did have a smell I opened it put it in the garage for the night and was good to go. I am not sure why people have a hard time getting back in the bag I do it by myself and have had no problem. It is a nice weight too, glad it isn’t much heavier.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. For sturdiness I only gave it a three stars because one of the screws that fall off but it was not a big deal. I would recommend maybe tightening the screws before using it it just always making sure that they are tight and so you don’t lose any. Other than that the soccer team loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Rosalia

customer_reviews.title: Great for little soccer players.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year olds soccer team. Works great and is a great way to keep the kids in one place when they aren't in the game. Other coaches without a bench have wrangle the little ones on the side. The kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our child's soccer team to use and have been very pleased with it. It is easy to open up and use and when done, it folds up pretty easily as well. The only real improvement we could see would be to make the handles on the carrying case adjustable so that you can carry it on your shoulders like if it had a shoulder strap. We would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Christopher Smith

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The fabric of this chair tore the first time my grandkids sat on it. Very disappointed especially since seller was unable to replace
customer_reviews.author: K J.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this/these chairs. Seriously best purchase I've made in a long time. We are a family of 5 and instead of lugging around 5 separate chairs we take this and it's perfect. Super easy to open and put back in bag too! We get so many compliments on it too! I'd definitely purchase again if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Schad

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase! We bought this bench for our U12 soccer team. The bench starters to rip after a few months along with several bolts falling out constantly while at games. The bag the bench comes in lasted maybe 1-2 weeks. The quality is very poor and design is even worse. The warranty is short so the issues with the bench were not covered. I’d look for a bench with plastic caps sown in at each chair post.
customer_reviews.author: Bullvikings2001

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these to replace an older set we had. We use them for our girls Soccer Team to have a place to sit during the games. I’m extremely disappointed in this set of chairs. It’s ridiculous that we only used them for a few games & the fabric is already tearing, so much that we’ve gone back to using the older set we had for 2+ years! I would NOT recommend buying these chairs, invest in other brands that would last longer!
customer_reviews.author: Bevorugby

customer_reviews.title: Best kuds sports portable seating
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench seat! Bought it for my sons soccer team and it is so awesome for them when they need to rest between playing. It’s also lightweight for me (5’3”- 150lbs) to carry and fold up after use. Keeps kids more focused on the game than sitting on the grass by far.
customer_reviews.author: Miss MoeGisele

customer_reviews.title: The worst quality, horrible customer service, do not buy it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for my son's tennis team. The quality was so bad, the material starting coming apart in just a couple of uses. I contacted the company, they did not respond. I shop a lot at Amazon. This was the worst purchase and customer service I have ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Sarafian

customer_reviews.title: Portable foldable bench
customer_reviews.text: A little bulky and heavy to carry. Great product for Soccer games, family gatherings, and camping trips. I love the product and the coaches love the convenience of not having their athletes to have to sit on wet or insect grounds. The only issue we had was we lost one of the screws on the back leg after using it 30 times: was easily replaced and the carrying case is beginning to fray slightly by the openning of the carrying case. The product is worth the money and more.
customer_reviews.author: N Bennett

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to open. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: It definitely smelled like a chemical or something. Had to air it out before I gave it to my son's soccer coach for their recent tournament. It was so bad, I was thinking about leaving it outside during a storm to get the smell off of it. But other than that, it is a pretty good deal.
customer_reviews.author: myked

customer_reviews.title: Off gassing smell but works
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is really that it smells like bad chemical off gassing that gives me a headache and it’s been 2 months
customer_reviews.author: Jon d

customer_reviews.title: great for kids bums :)
customer_reviews.text: bought this, works great, but my grown-up bum is a little to big so after sitting for a while, the frame starts to make it uncomfortable. I am overweight, but (I dont think) I have an incredibly big bum (for reference)
customer_reviews.author: MillionMom

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Last
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to purchase this for my soccer team, however after using it only five times there are two tears and two screws are missing. 7-8 years old sit in these seats so it’s not a weight issue. I am so disappointed in product not even lasting a season. It’s sad to spend good money on a product that doesn’t last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a team
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son’s soccer team. It’s fairly easy to open and close and to put back in the bag. Wish the bag was better quality, it’s already ripping apart after a few uses, but the chairs themselves are great and I expect they’ll hold up for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: RoyalSmash

customer_reviews.title: Almost pefect
customer_reviews.text: Work perfect for my son's basketball team, fifth graders. setup and breakdown is quick, stable for all the boys. my only problem was\is the smell. I owned for about a month now, Febrezed the $h1t out of it, cleaned it with water and soap, and even left it open, outside for a week and it smelled bad. It' finally going away, but the smell was horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst quality
customer_reviews.text: Not durable at all, anchor screws fall out and the fabric rips easily! I will never purchase from them again! Go with the flag benches with no back.
customer_reviews.author: YogiSunChild

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Such an awesome chair! It fits our family perfectly and always gets lots of attention! I suspect it will be difficult to find even spots to set it up sometimes and not tweak it, just due to its size. But we're LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: VERY STRONG CHEMICAL ODOR
customer_reviews.text: VERY strong chemical odor. I have it airing out right now. If the smell doesn't go away in a couple of days I'll have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: MY

customer_reviews.title: Good benches
customer_reviews.text: These were great for soccer games. As a coach of young ones it is way easier to keep them paying attention by having a bench like this. The only reason I am giving these benches 4 stars is because they stunk like chemicals when I got them. They had to air out for like 2 weeks to lose the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby O'Keefe

customer_reviews.title: torn up after few uses
customer_reviews.text: we bought this chair for my son's soccer team(8 years old). we only used it for 2-3 weekends and the top of the back were already torn up. the chair itself is sturdy. had to return it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for us to sit on during my son's flag football games. Super easy!! love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fits 12 year old boys, who of course try to cram as many kids on it as they can. Held up great so far!
customer_reviews.author: turnzwood

customer_reviews.title: Be aware
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this bench for a year and all the bolts and screws are falling off. And they are not easy to put back in. I’ve had to put zip ties to hold them. I’ve contacted the seller and there is nothing they can do for me and just advise me to buy a new bench. For what? So it can fall apart again. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: i.Parocua

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My soccer team uses this. If I forget it in my other car they are all bummed out !!!😂
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Burroso

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our U10 soccer team!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench! It folds up well and easy to put back in the storage bag. The price can't be beat. I'm certainly going to be purchasing another one!
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my grandchildrens soccer team and they were delighted with them. No more sitting on the ground or standing on the wet grass. The coaches enjoyed them as well. The chairs managed the weight of the coaches and team members. Easy to set up and take down. Just used them this one season.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We used this for my son’s soccer team and it was a game changer!
customer_reviews.author: cricket miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry and use anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight, easy to fold up and store that my 9year old can do it. The carrying case has a strap so you can throw them over your shoulder and go. They’re about as comfortable as these folding chairs can be. But plenty of seating for our family outings so I can’t complain!
customer_reviews.author: AmberB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Soccer Team!
customer_reviews.text: My husband coaches soccer for 6 year olds, and this is the perfect lightweight chairs for the team! Folds up very quickly, and can easily be carried.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our team!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Easy to carry and set up Our soccer team loves the bench. We are so glad we bought it
customer_reviews.author: Lori G.

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for one season thus far. My daughter’s sports teams love this thing. It’s a little cumbersome to get back in the carry case, so we don’t really use it, just put it in the cart and go. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Perfect for keeping our young boys on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Perfect for keeping our young boys on the bench during games. Easy to transport. Love the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Breezey

customer_reviews.title: Great for my soccer team
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. I use this for my kids soccer team. As far as durability, some screws just fell out. I got some loctite and screws to strengthen the unit
customer_reviews.author: Jason M Belt

customer_reviews.title: Great Field Hockey Sideline bench - No more wiggling girls
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter's field hockey team is enjoying the bench so much. Instead of sitting or wiggling on the sometimes muddy or dusty ground they sit quietly on the comfortable bench. Thank you! They are loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, Really nice for my 8 yo soccer team.
customer_reviews.author: Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, spend more money and buy a higher quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Please do Purchased these chairs. I purchased these chairs for my soccer team at the beginning of the season approximately two months ago. After approximately five weeks of once a week use the metal poles which have relatively sharp tops cut through nearly every single part of the canvas on top. Please see pictures. I was drawn to this product due to its price but beware.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Lorber

customer_reviews.title: Great price, easy to fold up
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Kids love it at the soccer games instead of setting on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and perfect for a quick setup for seating. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: June Di Franco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for youth sports teams.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for kids' soccer team and it worked great. Sturdy and easy enough to pack. A little heavy, so it's nice to have a wagon or something if you have to haul it very far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kiddos not so much adults
customer_reviews.text: Coach loved it for our soccer girls. It is great for the 4-6 year olds. Not so comfy for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great sideline bench for the U8 team
customer_reviews.text: Upgrade from the tarp on the ground from last year. Great sideline bench for the U8 team.
customer_reviews.author: DadZ

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.text: These benches fell apart after using them 5 times for a group of 9 and ten year olds girls. Contacted seller several times without any response. Don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Helen trimble

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and great for children or adults
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my daughters soccer team. It was a nice place for the players not in the game to sit and relax until It was their turn.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi S.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: used it for two soccer seasons and one tee ball worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Chanel

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great. I have a large large family and this makes it so much easier to carry a seat for all of us.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for cook outs
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to pack and unpack. Folds into the size of one chair. 200lb weight limit per seat.
customer_reviews.author: fungirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the family whenever we go to my sons soccer practices and games. It’s perfect, sturdy, lightweight, and I’ve received a lot of compliments on it! Great price also!!
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: Great bench!
customer_reviews.text: Had a little smell to it but nothing Fabreeze couldn't take care of.
customer_reviews.author: Gooch

customer_reviews.title: Not worth money
customer_reviews.text: Great chair just wished it held up as expected. We used it for a youth 4 and 6 Soccer team and after about 8 games worth it started to rip and the black pieces came off. Not worth the money if we constantly are trying to fix or now possibly try to sew a patch in it. It was not worth the money it should be priced cheaper if it wasn’t made to last more then a year ( or 1 1/2 months in my case).
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: This is great for my 6 year old daughter's soccer team
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my 6 year old daughter's soccer team! All the girls love it and it keeps them off the wet grass!! It's easy to fold and unfold and comes with a nice carry case!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Marciano

customer_reviews.title: Holding up great after lots of uses.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fold and carry, kids like the back rest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The canvas is a nice material. The bench is durable and came with ...
customer_reviews.text: The canvas is a nice material. The bench is durable and came with a great carrying case. It was a big hit for my 5 year old's soccer team. Some of the parents also sat on it and it was plenty strong enough to handle them. Great value for the price. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be a great asset to our senior community
customer_reviews.author: Amy Bigler

customer_reviews.title: Easy to transport and set up
customer_reviews.text: This bench is easy to carry (in the case that came with it) and easy to set up. Kids like it and even the coaches sit in it. This was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Good portable bench for the price
customer_reviews.text: Lasted the whole rec season for youth soccer without falling apart. Quick and easy to set up and break down.
customer_reviews.author: bub

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product- don’t buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used 12 times for boys age10-12 soccer. Really, really poor quality!!! Huge disappointment for $70. Waste of time and money. See my pictures if you don’t believe me.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Thatcher

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm. Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it and it’s good except for it had small holes where it was stitched. And indentations where it has been sitting for too long, hopefully they don’t stay.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, use it for both my sons soccer and flag football teams. The kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: nikki swain

customer_reviews.title: Team loves it, (HEAVY)
customer_reviews.text: 25 lbs is not lightweight. Heavy! but well worth it. The team is so happy with it. much more affordable than many I have seen. GET THIS BENCH!
customer_reviews.author: mpr4u2hl

customer_reviews.title: People love these when we take these out with our family ...
customer_reviews.text: People love these when we take these out with our family at the football games and we can all share a blanket
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Tore in multiple places second time it was used. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: S. Howe

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dollar
customer_reviews.text: We are using this bench for kids under 8 soccer team. It is easy to set up and put away. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Holland

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a soccer coach and used this bench a handful of times before it literally started falling apart. My boys started falling through the seats and injured themselves. Asked to return it and they denied it. Seems to me they know their product is crap and just want to take your money and run!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Every team must have
customer_reviews.text: We bought this last year for our sons soccer team...and THEY LOVE IT!! It's light weight and super easy to pack back up and put in it's carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Megan l

customer_reviews.title: Arrived undamaged.
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect! Having a big family it helps minimize all the extra seats!
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: Extra Chairs
customer_reviews.text: had a bbq over the weekend, the chairs worked out perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. This made soccer season easier
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. This made soccer season easier, instead of lugging around 5 separate chairs. I’d recommend getting a foldable wagon too.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Dasher

customer_reviews.title: Soccer bench
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my soccer team boys. It’s easy to set up and take down and easy to transport! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: Well built and perfect. Using as a bench for a boys soccer team.
customer_reviews.author: Jritt777

customer_reviews.title: Great for sports teams!
customer_reviews.text: Durable and lightweight! Love this product and so does my soccer team!
customer_reviews.author: Rosalina Cornish

customer_reviews.title: very useful
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best chair for the team, so much that we bought 2- they work great and are very easy to use I would recomend
customer_reviews.author: omar garrrido

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my son’s flag football team
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my son’s flag football team. So easy to set up and put away. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: screws fell off
customer_reviews.text: Not very expensive so it shows on the quality. The boys only used it for a couple of tournaments and the screws fell off half the bench, so backs are no longer supporting.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Flores

customer_reviews.title: Sports bench 3*
customer_reviews.text: The bench smells bad and not cool when driving with that but does the job. Fairly comfortable and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Game day must..
customer_reviews.text: Great bench my players love it and it easier to keep them focused when subbed out.
customer_reviews.author: James b

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bench for my summer camping trip and everybody loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is extremely compact and easy to open and collapse
customer_reviews.text: It is extremely compact and easy to open and collapse. Our initial use was a group gathering in the park and our friends thought it was the best idea ever because it has 6 seats but the size is about the size of 1 to 2.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred S Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are great quality and actually comfortable to sit in!
customer_reviews.author: Zo

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping.
customer_reviews.text: I set it up on one side of a table and 5 littles fit and are comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: Good product, easy to fold and store. We use it for youth soccer games and they hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hennessy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a team bench. Good sturdy carrier to transport. Arrived on time and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Rohrbaugh

product_meta.title: YAHEETECH Portable Folding bleacher Bench Folding Camping Chair Outdoor Team Sport Bench 6 Seaters Lightweight with Back, Sidebags, a Carry Bag
feature_bullets: Sturdy construction, strong steel frame, durable and long lasting
Lightweight, portable, foldable; Easy to transport with carry bag included; G.W.: 22.97 Lb
Overall Length up to 106”, longer than similar products, more space for each seat, more comfortable and more stable for seating
No need to assemble, open in seconds; Great for sporting, camping and other outdoor activities
Comes with a carry bag makes it easy to carry and transport
